about_the_game:
Ourlands is a cozy island builder where you craft bespoke little lands for quirky little characters.

BUILD

In Ourlands, it's up to you to build cozy little islands unique to different people's needs. Whether someone is very much into flowers and wants a massive garden, or they may be a witch who wants to be lost in the woods, it's up to you to help them craft their perfect slice of paradise.

EXPAND

The more islands you build, the more people you attract! Expand your lands to host a wide cast of characters, each looking for their own unique little space to fit their varying personalities.

DISCOVER

With dozens of items to discover, your islands can become whatever you need them to be! From chill beachside campfire cookouts to lonely rocky hilltops, items will help you fully explore your creativity.

SHARE

Use the photo mode to capture your favorite creations and share postcards with the world.

Key Features:

  • Build cozy islands
  • Unlock dozens of items
  • Unlock a cast of quirky characters
  • Share beautiful creations
